Comment: > Naw, I say! Them elite fat cats over in [capital city] jus' don't understand what the real problems that real Americans face really are. Theys just corrupt, corrupt to tha core I tells ya and it's because of the gays.  Crowd murmurs.  > Tha's why you gots to send more Republicans like me to tell em what for!  Steps into waiting SUV  > Do you think they bought it? And hand me my cognac, I'm parched.
